achievements.title: AICamp Generative AI Hackathon
achievements.description: Won the overall winner prize at the AICamp Generative AI Hackathon by creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks on behalf of users.

achievements.title: NREL Software Development
achievements.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements.

achievements.title: Oracle Financial Services Software Development
achievements.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered 6 GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines.

achievements.title: Microservices Video to MP3 Converter Project
achievements.description: Engineered a distributed system for converting video files to MP3 format using microservices architecture. Implemented secure JWT user authentication, message queuing with RabbitMQ, scalable storage, notifications.

achievements.title: Cloud-based Video Face Recognition App
achievements.description: Designed a 3-tier hybrid cloud architecture leveraging AWS and OpenStack for Web, App, and Data tiers integration. Prepared Python scripts for automatic scaling of EC2 instances via SQS and Cloudwatch.

achievements.title: Classic To-Do List Web Application
achievements.description: Developed a full-stack task manager webapp with CRUD operations using React and Go with PostgreSQL database. Implemented GraphQL API for efficient data retrieval and deployed on AWS with self-signed SSL certificate for HTTPS.

achievements.title: Voice AI Interviewer Agent
achievements.description: Engineered an AI-powered voice interviewer, leveraging Groq for fast inference and Vapi for voice interactions. Implemented evaluation system with custom metrics, utilizing Supabase for authentication and storage.

achievements.title: Embedded C++ Developer at Inter-university Accelerator Centre
achievements.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Optimized the system for real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.

achievements.title: Python Developer at College of Engineering Pune
achievements.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Designed a custom-built library for processing 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with 95% accuracy using linear regression.
